subtitle: Cherries, plums and apples are combined in this gorgeous dessert.

method.text: Place the sugar and water in a heavy based saucepan. Simmer gently for about 5 min until sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 min, until just beginning to thicken.
Pour in the wine, lemon juice and cinnamon sticks. Simmer for 10-15 min uncovered until reduced slightly.
Stir in the prepared fruit. Simmer for 4-5 min until tender.

title: Summer cherry compote
